xmldoc.short_description: Computes the matrix logarithm of a square matrix.

param_input_item.param_description: a numeric value: scalar or square matrix (double or single)

param_output_item.param_description: a numeric value: a square matrix

description.p: expm(x) computes the matrix logarithm of x.
The computation is performed by first block-diagonalizing x and then applying a Pade approximation on each block.
